unnormalised: Hey, any update on Dhawan's injury? Hope he recovers soon! Last I heard from AIIMS, it wasn't great news. He's crucial for us, yaar. Remember that "Chak De! India" spirit? We need that, even if he's out a few matches. Let's pray for a speedy recovery, maybe before the next 20-20. Wishing him well from Delhi! Think he can manage at least 50 Rs by next week's match. Hope he can cover at least 20 km.
normalised: Hey, any update on Dhawan's injury? Hope he recovers soon! Last I heard from A I I M S, it wasn't great news. He's crucial for us, yaar. Remember that "Chak De! India" spirit? We need that, even if he's out a few matches. Let's pray for a speedy recovery, maybe before the next twenty-twenty. Wishing him well from Delhi! Think he can manage at least fifty rupees by next week's match. Hope he can cover at least twenty kilometer.
